Title: Politics reach the dining hall, cadres work in the kitchen
Publisher: Jiangsu renmin chubanshe (江苏人民出版社), Nanjing
Notes: The sign above the door says "Commune members' home" (社员之家). The red banner with yellow characters: "When the dining hall is well-run, the production spirit will be strong" (食堂办得好生产干勁强). The poster on the wall left of the door could not be identified (yet).
